name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior SAP Engineer with extensive experience in troubleshooting and root-cause analysis, committed to driving process improvements within SAP environments. Proven analytical skills and problem-solving abilities, enabling effective communication and team collaboration to enhance system configurations and optimize workflows. Strong proficiency in SAP architecture, ensuring robust and compliant solutions for enterprise applications. 

Possessing 13+ years of full stack development expertise, including hands-on experience with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, as well as frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in developing high-performance applications in compliance with industry standards and equipped to leverage cloud-native services on **AWS** and **Azure**. Adept in implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines, with a solid foundation in AI/ML initiatives, including MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
